title: Not a 'bubble,' but maybe an 'air pocket': Wall Street says it's time to reset the AI narrative
description: Two of Wall Street’s biggest firms say the AI boom isn’t a bubble, arguing real spending and earnings support the stock market rally even as near-term risks ...
content:
Two of Wall Streets biggest firms say the AI boom is far from a speculative mania.
Instead, BlackRock and Bank of America say this cycle is being driven by real corporate investment, earnings, and p… [+4274 chars]
